select p.prcs_id as prcs_id, p.nm as nm, p.eqm_id as eqm_id, e.eqm_name as eqm_name from prcs p join eqm e on p.eqm_id = e.eqm_id
where SUBSTR(p.prcs_id, 5, 4) = #{prcsSelDeta}

SELECT pid.indica_deta_id as indica_deta_id, p.prdt_nm as prdt_nm, pid.qy as qy, pid.indica_dt as indica_dt FROM PROD_INDICA_DETA pid join line l on pid.line_id = l.line_id join prdt p on l.prdt_id = p.prdt_id
trunc(pid.indica_dt) >= to_date(#{startD})
and trunc(pid.indica_dt) <= to_date(#{endD})
group by pid.indica_deta_id, l.prdt_id, p.prdt_nm, pid.qy, pid.indica_dt order by pid.indica_deta_id
